channel.title: Kfc on Brainsation
channel.description: Recent content in Kfc on Brainsation

item.title: Agents Were Shocked at What They Found in This Abandoned KFC
The Hole InThe Tile Was Only Eight Inches In Diameter
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); IMAGE CREDIT (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); “It was barely large enough to fit a 15-piece family bucket of chicken,” said Officer Duane Williams. It could have easily been overlooked as just another deteriorating aspect of an dilapidated fast food restaurant, had local police not known better. After all, this wasn’t just any vacant KFC but one in San Luis, Arizona, situated some 200 yards north of the border the United States shares with Mexico.

item.title: Lopez Leads San Luis Police To An Abandoned KFC
The Secret Tunnel Was An Underground Drug Highway
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); IMAGE CREDIT (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); The discovery prompted the inevitable comparisons to _Breaking Bad_and Los Pollos Hermanos. Countless news stories relayed the tunnel’s dimensions: three feet wide, five feet tall, and about 600 feet long. The local news constantly repeated the sensational figure that “more than $1 million worth of cocaine, methamphetamine, fentanyl and heroin” had been found the day before on Lopez.

item.title: The Drug Cartels Are Getting More Sophisticated
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); IMAGE CREDIT (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); There have been 203 tunnels discovered in the US Border Patrol’s history. “This was the fifth tunnel to be discovered in that region since 2007,” said Border Patrol spokesman Jose Garibay III. Most are rudimentary, hand-dug tunnels that are essentially “dangerous, unfinished passages.

item.title: The Authorities Know What To Look For
Trump's Signature Campaign Issue Was Illegal Immigration
